featured.text: In the Bermuda Triangle, a region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean, some airplanes and ships were reported to have mysteriously disappeared without a _____.

definition.zh_def: 百慕達，位於大西洋的一組島嶼，以其美麗的海灘和旅遊業聞名。
definition.en_def: Bermuda, a group of islands in the Atlantic Ocean known for its beautiful beaches and tourism.
definition.example: We are planning a vacation to Bermuda next summer.
